node.title: Death toll from Wisconsin Christmas parade tragedy rises to six
node.alt: Police office looks for evidence at crime scene, at night, holding a torch.
node.description: An eight-year-old becomes the sixth person to die in the wake of the incident in the US, where a court has heard witness accounts of the driver intentionally swerving the SUV to hit people.
node.content: ["A sixth person has died in the wake of the\u00a0Waukesha Christmas parade crash in the US, where a court has heard\u00a0witness accounts of the driver intentionally swerving\u00a0the SUV to hit people.\u00a0", "The sixth victim was an eight-year-old \u2014 the first child to die as a result of Sunday's incident.", "Prosecutors told the court 62 people were injured when the\u00a0SUV ploughed into the crowd, an\u00a0increase from earlier reports of 48.\u00a0", "The alleged driver, Darrell Brooks Jr, has been\u00a0charged with five counts of intentional homicide, but prosecutors say more charges are pending.\u00a0", "Mr Brooks made his initial appearance in court on Tuesday. \u00a0", "Court documents included a witness account\u00a0that the vehicle \"appeared to be intentionally moving side to side\" with no attempt to slow down or stop as it struck multiple people.", "According to court documents, a police officer shot at the vehicle, striking it three times, and a detective stepped in front of the vehicle and pounded on the bonnet\u00a0shouting \"stop\" several times, but Mr Brooks drove past him.", "More to come", "ABC with wires\u00a0\u00a0"]
